type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.task.TaskProgressEvent
type.description: * Root interface for all events that signal progress while executing a task. * * @since 2.5

method.name: getDescriptor
method.description: * Returns the description of the task for which progress is reported. * * @return The description of the underlying task operation.

property.name: descriptor
property.description: * Returns the description of the task for which progress is reported. * * @return The description of the underlying task operation.
